DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine whether high-dose intravenous immune globulin ( IVIG ) effective placebo restore neurologic function ( muscle strength ) patient multiple sclerosis . II . Determine time recovery follow IVIG .
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Study Intravenous Immune Globulin Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind study . Patients treat intravenous immune globulin placebo . In absence hypersensitivity reaction test dose , total 11 dos administer : daily 5 day , every 2 week 12 week . Patients follow 3 month .
